titles.title: Voluntary School Prayer Act of 1987
A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to allow voluntary school prayer.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Voluntary School Prayer Act of 1987 - Eliminates Supreme Court and Federal district court jurisdiction to review or hear any case arising out of State law relating to voluntary prayer in public buildings and schools.
